metadata.title: CVE-2017-8378 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the PdfParser::ReadObjects function inbase/PdfParser.cpp in PoDoFo 0.9.5 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified otherimpact via vectors related to m_offsets.size.

criterions.comment: libpodofo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
